data.title: Justifiably popular
data.text: Loads of choice of very reasonably priced crepes, sandwiches, soup and salads and inexpensive wines. The serves are oversized so sharing is a great option. The Milano crepe ( grilled eggplant) very good washed down with decent Argentinian Malbec.

data.title: Reliable neighborhood eatery
data.text:
Great breakfasts, salads,  pasta and more.  Friendly and good service. We live in San Rafael and eat here regularly
Good prices, good value. Dining available inside and out . Good neighborhood for shopping too

data.title: Frequent Customers
data.text: We visit Crepe Vine probably about once a week!  What makes this place special is their willingness to customize our order by adding extra salad instead of fries, or substituting chicken instead of beef.  We also enjoy their happy hour IPA with extra lemon wedges!  It is a pleasure to be served in an environment where cultural diversity and service is a high priority.  Their menu is consistently good and wholesome and outdoor seating in downtown San Rafael is very enjoyable on those beautiful Marin days.

data.title: Delicious food!
data.text: The food at The crepe vine is so delicious and the crepes are fantastic. Highly recommend to everyone!

data.title: Sidewalk Cafe in San Rafael
data.text: I have had lunch there a few times and I am always pleased with the food and the friendly service. I like being out by the sidewalk where I can watch the locals stroll by and feel more Euro

data.title: Chicken Shawarma YES PLEASE!
data.text: I go once a month just to quell my craving for the best chicken shawarmas around.  A huge shawarma cut in two halves, plus I get the crispy, salty, crunchy fries.  The caesar salad is a tasty bonus.  The orange, carrot, ginger juice with it is just the best.  My mouth is watering just thinking about all of it!

data.title: Fresh Inventative Food
data.text: What is surprising is the amount of creativity in the menu. There is a lot to choose from and the food is made with quality ingredients.You select your food at the counter and it is brought to your table. The service is fast and professional. The crowd is mixture of regulars, college crowd, and families. There is a very positive feeling even when busy and full. The kitchen is open and you can see what is happening there.

data.title: Fabulous eggs benedict and sides.
data.text: Enjoyed a lunch here with work colleagues.  The food was truly delicious.  Fresh, flavorful, generous portions.   Priced a little high for lunch but not for the size of the meal and the freshness of products.   You stand in line to order and then wait at a table to be served.   Truly wonderful eggs benedict.   Colleagues had salads, pancakes, burger & fries.   Much variety.

data.title: Pretty Good—but not true crêpes.
data.text: This is a nice, reasonably priced eatery with a very interesting signature non-alcoholic beverage, but if you are used to crêpes as they are made in Brêton and the Mediterranean, you will be disappointed.

data.title: Actually, not bad
data.text: The Crepe Vine is a very informal eatery which requires you to place your order with the cashier, find a seat and wait for your food to be delivered to your table.  The menu is extensive, including a variety of crepes, salads, pasta, burgers, tacos etc.  While the food is OK, nothing to write home about, the portions are HUGE...plenty enough to share or take home for the next day's lunch.  Sometime the service is slow, however the staff is always pleasant and helpful. If you happen to have your dog with you there is an outdoor seating section and the helpful staff will make sure your puppy is provided with water.

data.title: Wonderful for the whole family including those with dietary restrictions.
data.text: The Crepe Vine consistently puts out wonderful means around the clock. The portions are generous, and many items are even gluten free. The menu is very diverse and they even have a kids eat free night.

data.title: Good food
data.text: I love this place for a casual meal.  They have many wonderful choices of which I like the crepes, the salads and the hamburgers.  The prices are very reasonable considering the quality and portions served.  Great  for families or just meeting a friend.

data.title: Great food, come hungry
data.text: Surprised how great the food was as I've be to other crepe restaurants before that were so so. I thought $13 for a crepe was expensive until I got my food with a big crepe, home style potatoes and salad. I got the Santa Fe and it was soooo good. Very friendly staff too.

data.title: breakfast with grandchildren
data.text:
When ever we come to San Rafael we ALWAYS make a visit to The Crepe Vine , you cannot beat it for great food
always busy but service is fast and friendly. Will keep coming.

data.title: Mezzo mezzo
data.text: They are nice enough people. Just found it to be incredibly mediocre. Nothing stood out that I have ordered.

data.title: Great lunch venue!
data.text: Pleasant indoor/outdoor (sidewalk seating) restaurant w/ walk-up ordering, pleasant staff, reasonable prices, great selection!

data.title: Causal dining in San Rafael
data.text: Thia is one of me "go to" places for lunch or a light dinner in San Rafael.  It is fun to eat outside on the sidewalk when the weather is pleasant.  The food is always good.  I love the Bangkok salad, but the crepes andpastas are also good.  The staff has always been pleasant, too.

data.title: Great food/friendly staff
data.text: Great place. Open later than other places in San Rafael. We go there at least once a week. Everything I've ever ordered has been good. Their salads are always fresh. We love the place!!

data.title: Tasty comfort food
data.text: Good tasty food but not as healthy as one could ask for.   We have had many great dishes there and could never say a bad thing about any one of them. The  ambience  is very casual and light. Right in downtown San Rafael.  A good many choices to be healthy or not. I would recommend it.

data.title: Go early to get a great breakfast and a table!!
data.text: Crepe vine is a great place to get a wholesome fresh meal with great service!  It gets crowded quickly on the weekends so go early.  My favorite is the Mission scramble with fresh chorizo!!
